value.title: Now Available: Pricing changes to Azure Sentinel and Azure Monitor to help you reduce costs
value.excerpt: Enjoy additional cost savings with the new price changes to Azure Sentinel and Azure monitor.  These changes took effect on June 2, 2021.

value.title: Public preview: Log Analytics workspace insights from Azure Monitor
value.excerpt: A new workbooks-based insights experience for all log analytics workspaces available per resource, and at scale.

value.title: Azure is the home for your enterprise Java applications
value.excerpt: Microservice architectures are becoming more prevalent, and developers are building more applications on cloud platforms using containers and managed services. The Java ecosystem is complex and running Java applications in the cloud at an enterprise scale can be challenging. Our customers are asking

value.title: Public preview: Stateful and 1-minute frequency log alerts in Azure Monitor
value.excerpt: Log search based alerts can now be automatically resolved, and query can be evaluated every minute for faster time to fire.

value.title: Public preview: Azure Static Web Apps now supports deployment with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Azure Static Web Apps, currently in public preview, now supports building and deploying apps with Azure DevOps.

value.title: Start using new alerts in Azure Monitor for Azure China 21Vianet
value.excerpt: Classic alerts in Azure Monitor will be retired on 29 February 2024.

value.title: New Azure Monitor Agent available on latest Linux distros and new regions
value.excerpt: The new Azure Monitor Agent now supports the latest Linux distros and can be installed on additional new regions using Data Collection Rules.

value.title: Changes in Azure Monitor Logs for the AzureDiagnostics table is now available
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor Logs will now allow more than 500 dimensions to be collected to the AzureDiagnostics table by introducing an "overflow" column.

value.title: Azure Monitor ITSM Connector for ServiceNow ITOM with Secure Export
value.excerpt: Introducing a public preview of Secure Export as a new version of Azure Monitor ITSM Connector, providing integration with ServiceNow ITOM.

value.title: View change data through Azure Monitor workbook integration with Application Change Analysis
value.excerpt: Application Change Analysis integration with Azure Monitor workbook is now in public preview

value.title: Cross resource query between Azure Monitor and Azure Data Explorer in public preview
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor cross resource query enables you to run cross-resource queries by using client tools that support Kusto queries.

value.title: Azure Repos - New enhancements to pull request experience
value.excerpt: In this sprint, we're doubling down our investments in the pull request experience with a list of new enhancements.

value.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor for containers new Reports(tab) & deployment live logs
value.excerpt: Now access all your Kubernetes related visualizations such as Node-disk, Node-network, Workloads & Persistent Volume, and many more in new Reports(tab). As part of this update you can also view, search, and filter pod Live Logs of AKS deployments for quick troubleshooting.

value.title: Azure Boards - Delivery Plans 2.0 is now in preview
value.excerpt: With this release, we're announcing the public preview release of Delivery Plans 2.0 and other improvements.

value.title: Guest health feature in Azure Monitor for virtual machines
value.excerpt: We are announcing the preview of Azure Monitor for virtual machines guest health feature that monitors the health of your virtual machines and fires an alert when any parameter being monitored is outside the acceptable range.

value.title: Preview: Azure Monitor for containers now support capacity monitoring of Persistent Volume (PV)
value.excerpt: In this preview support you can monitor the capacity of the PVs. You can visualize, query and enable fast alert on the PV capacity & inventory metrics.

value.title: WhiteSource Launches Extension For Microsoft Azure DevOps Services
value.excerpt: WhiteSource, the leader in open source security and license compliance management software, announced today its new native integration

value.title: Azure Repos adds a default branch at the org-level
value.excerpt: With this release, we're adding the ability to set a default branch for the entire organization.

value.title: Enabling resilient DevOps practices with code to cloud automation
value.excerpt: At Microsoft Ignite we announced new GitHub Actions for Azure, which we added to our growing catalogue of Azure and GitHub integrations, with more to come soon.

value.title: Azure DevTest Labs: Encrypt OS disks in your lab
value.excerpt: Protect your labs data and data stored on managed disks while resting assured that you are hitting your organization's security and compliance benchmarks with Server-Side Encryption.

value.title: Change data integration in Azure Monitor for VMs is now in public preview
value.excerpt: You can now observe degradation of performance or health in a VM with the new change data integration in Azure Monitor for VMs.

value.title: General availability of Azure Monitor for Key Vault and Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor for Key Vault and Azure Monitor for Azure Cache for Redis provide out of the box insights for these resources using platform telemetry.

value.title: The Azure Monitor Logs page now links to the community GitHub repo
value.excerpt: Writing queries can be challenging. The Azure Monitor Logs page now links to hundreds of community-shared examples, so you don't need to start from scratch.

value.title: Azure Monitor for containers agent (ciprod08072020) update
value.excerpt: Azure monitor for containers new agent (ciprod08072020) will support new features & fixes such as monitoring support of deployments & Horizontal Pod Autoscaler(HPAs), displaying correct node status & health(tab) access through limited preview program.

value.title: Azure API Management will retire 5 legacy metrics in Azure Monitor on 31 August 2023
value.excerpt: Start using the new Requests metric in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Improvements to Azure Monitor Metric Alerts
value.excerpt: Several new features and improvements in Azure metric alerts are now available.

value.title: Azure Monitor Agent and Data Collection Rules Public Preview
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor is introducing a new concept for data collection configuration and a new, unified agent for Azure Monitor in Public Preview.

value.title: Introducing Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks
value.excerpt: Azure Load Balancer customers now have instant access to a preconfigured solution for health monitoring and configuration analysis enabling rapid fault localization and informed design decisions.

images.title: Introducing Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks

value.title: New features and insights in Azure Monitor
value.excerpt: Customers need full stack observability for their apps and infrastructure across Azure and hybrid environments to ensure their workloads are always up and running, for which they rely on Azure Monitor. Over the past few months, we have released many new capabilities targeting to improve native integration

images.title: New features and insights in Azure Monitor

value.title: Deploy to Azure using GitHub Actions from your favorite tools
value.excerpt:
Enterprises and teams are adopting DevOps technologies combined with people and processes to deliver high-quality code, with faster release cycles and continuous delivery of value, to achieve higher levels of satisfaction for their own customers.

However, it can often get difficult to craft CI/CD

images.title: Deploy to Azure using GitHub Actions from your favorite tools
